hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Verona - Grand Hotel Des Arts
hotels.title: Italy Heritage Oasis in the Heart of Verona Minutes from Juliet's Balcony
hotels.description: Step into a world of romance and Shakespearean wonders with a stay at Hotel Indigo Verona - Grand Hotel Des Arts, an IHG Hotel, a gorgeous property first built in the 1920s. Spend your days exploring the home of Romeo and Juliet, dining along the bustling Piazza delle Erbe, admiring the stunning architecture of the Verona Arena and, of course, marveling at the gorgeous stone balcony of Juliet's House. Then, return to this splendid oasis and enjoy an elaborate cocktail at Arya Bar & Mixology.

hotels.title: Contemporary Verona Escape Minutes from Train Station & Exhibition Centre
hotels.description: Escape to Crowne Plaza Verona - Fiera, an IHG Hotel for a comfortable stay just minutes from the vibrant city. Take a short walk to Juliet's house to see the iconic balcony that inspired Shakespeare's romantic masterpiece 'Romeo and Juliet', before sampling your way through the city's gelaterias, pizzerias and trattorias. Prepare to lift shopping bags with a workout at the onsite fitness centre, before kicking back with a glass of wine at Bellini's Bar.
